channel.title: autumn on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in autumn on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.12: Winter and Holiday Greetings
item.description: 19th December 2014 Hi everyone, Winter Solstice is just around the bend. Christmas decorations and songs are in all shops here. But it doesn’t look much like winter.

item.title: SVL 1.9: Palo Alto and Cousins
item.description: 13th October 2014 Hello everyone, How are you? Hope you are doing well ðŸ™‚ Here the weather is getting so cold (13C) in the evenings and mornings that we’ve started keeping the windows closed at night.

item.title: LOG 2.1: Autumn
item.description: 22nd September 2011 This morning on the radio, I heard a weather report unlike any other. The lady was shouting in German with even some ‘bad words’ which I could recognise about the summer which had more than its share of rain and how horrible it was that the bad weather was continuing into Autumn.

item.title: Autumn dance
item.description: It is time for leaves to bid farewell to the trees they leave Where they have lived for two happy seasons Leaving is an elation

item.title: Misty Night
item.description: On this misty night Trees are backlit mystically She cannot welcome Winter with any warmth Yet, when you are near The biting wind is forgiven

item.title: Pink Powder
item.description: Green sprinkles in brown eyes This creature I meet is soft It is a child, gentle, shy Yet eager I found you, little creature, And you seem to like me Are you lost?

item.title: Autumn Garden
item.description: However dim the light, The leaves glow bright In the Autumn Garden Almost as if they had a light of their own The grass stays green In the Autumn Garden So green like paddy Pleasing and calm, sparkling Golden yellow, orange
